tasks.label: Install Root Dependencies
tasks.command: [ ! -d "node_modules" ] && npm ci || echo "node_modules exists, skipping install"

tasks.label: Install Frontend Dependencies
tasks.command: cd frontend && ([ ! -d "node_modules" ] && npm ci || echo "node_modules exists, skipping install")

tasks.label: Install Backend Dependencies
tasks.command: cd backend && ([ ! -d "node_modules" ] && npm ci --legacy-peer-deps || echo "node_modules exists, skipping install")

tasks.label: Start Frontend
tasks.command: cd frontend && wait-for-it localhost:3000 -t 300 && npm run start

tasks.label: Run Seed
tasks.command: cd backend && wait-for-it localhost:3000 -t 300 && npm run seed
